job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Introduction to Shield AIbrbrShield AIs mission is to protect service members and civilians with artificially intelligent systems We currently design build and deploy a quadrotor robot that autonomously explores potentially hazardous environments to help service members make informed decisions For our worldclass team no idea is too ambitious and we never stop working to make possible what looks out of reach today We are backed by Silicon Valley venture capital firms including Andreessen Horowitz have been shipping product since 2018 and are growing rapidlybrbrstrong Job Description brbrstrongHelp us build worldclass infrastructure for training evaluating and productizing machine learning models As a member of our machine learning software infrastructure team you will work with colleagues to improve workflows develop pipelines to train and evaluate advanced machine learning models and ensure these pipelines are efficient and welltested At Shield youll be part of an elite team that uses machine learning to enable autonomous robots that save livesbrbrstrong What Youll Do brstrongulliWork with colleagues to design build and maintain high performance software libraries and pipelines for machine learning liliWork with team members to deliver software features ontime and meeting requirements liliIdentify performance bottlenecks and design and implement solutions for them liliImprove visibility into model training and experiment tracking for machine learning engineers liliDocument code and workflows to enable engineers to rapidly implement solutions using the pipelines liliMaintain a small machine learning model for demonstration prototyping and testing liliHelp manage our cluster resources liliLearn and apply best practices for state of the art machine learning development brbrliulstrong Projects You Might Work On brstrongulliSetup model tracking and metric visualizations using jupyter notebooks mlflow tensorboard or other modern tools liliOptimize pipeline implementations to reduce training time and maximize compute resource utilization liliEnable efficient hyperparameter optimization brbrliulstrong Required Qualifications brstrongulliBachelors in computer science software engineering machine learning engineering or similar field liliYou have a demonstrated record of working hard being a trustworthy teammate holding yourself and others to high standards and being kind to others liliGood written and verbal communication skills liulIf youre interested in being part of our team apply nowbrbrShield AI is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer We are committed tobrbrequal employment opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age marital status disability gender identity or Veteran status If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please let us knowbrbrTo conform to US Government regulations applicant must be a US citizen lawful permanent resident of the US protected individual as defined by 8 USC 1324ba3 or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the US Department of State
